traits.name: Amphibious
entries: Kysh can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Emissary of the Sea
entries: Kysh can communicate simple ideas with amphibious and water-breathing beasts. They understand the meaning of his words, but he cannot understand them in return.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Kysh makes two melee attacks with his spear.

actions.name: Spear
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft, one target. 5 (1d6 + 2 damage) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2 damage) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Kysh's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). He can cast the following spell, requiring only verbal components:
